import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return( <>

About

We have set up our studio so we can be personally involved with every single project and get
to be choosy about what work we take on â€” client or self-initiated .

We at Unite8 are a Web Development Company with a team of highly motivated and energetic individuals.
The common factor in all our team members is the desire to deliver excellent results to our clients.

We are located in Noida, India but we offer services all across the country.
Our contented clients can be found everywhere.
We aim to deliver SMO services, Email marketing, and SEO Services in India to name a few.
These services are accomplished to make long term partnerships.
We ensure that our customers have a smooth experience with us and choose us for the Web Development company that they trust.

) } export default About;
